description: the use of utils.synchronized is not logged. This makes it very hard to figure out what's going on if a stale lockfile is lying around causing a worker to just be stuck.
title: Waiting for lock is not logged

comments.content: the use of utils.synchronized is not logged. This makes it very hard to figure out what's going on if a stale lockfile is lying around causing a worker to just be stuck.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
